1.title: A Death Defying Mission
1.plot: In the midst of school presidential campaigns, someone is trying to frame Billie for shredding the exam papers in Ms Malik's office.

2.title: The Chairs of Shame
2.plot: Selene and Billie are sentenced to The Greenhouse for shredding the exam papers, which means Billie can no longer run in the elections.

3.title: The Greenhouse Mile
3.plot: The entire school turns against Billie and Selene as they learn they will have to resit their exams. The girls decide to work together in order to prove their innocence.

4.title: The Defiant Ones
4.plot: Billie and Selene ask Django to retrieve the CCTV footage of Ms Malik's room to find out who really shredded the exam papers, but their saboteur is one step ahead of them.

5.title: Conspiracy
5.plot: Bubs finds out who turned the camera off in Ms Malik's office during the shredding.

6.title: Time to Panic
6.plot: Billie is on the search for a new candidate to run against Blake in the school presidential campaign.

7.title: This Means War
7.plot: Someone by the name of Alessandro has been trolling Selene on Dixi.

8.title: The President This School Deserves
8.plot: Still searching for someone to run against Blake, Billie finds an unlikely candidate in Echo.

9.title: Let them Eat Cupcakes
9.plot: Billie rules out Blake as the shredder which means that someone else is out to get her.

10.title: Goodbye?
10.plot: Through an anonymous tip, Django is able to prove Selene and Billie's innocence and gets them out of The Greenhouse.

11.title: The Smell of Freedom
11.plot: Amani is left in shock when Alessandro breaks up with her on Dixi for everyone to see.

12.title: Milkshakespeare
12.plot: Billie and Bubs recruit Abi to go undercover and spy on Alessandro.

13.title: Can't Didate
13.plot: Jane gives Echo some much needed advice on giving speeches in the hopes that it will help her presidential campaign. Selene plans to confront Alessandro.

14.title: Cut to the Chase
14.plot: Billie and Selene find out a shocking truth about Alessandro.

15.title: The Alessandro Identity
15.plot: The gang find out that Alessandro's Dixi account has been hacked and someone is leaving mean messages on everyone's wall.

16.title: Abi or Not Abi?
16.plot: Abi tells the gang she is still tracking Alessandro even though he is made up. They go to confront her but run into Alessandro instead.

17.title: A Delicate Situation
17.plot: Billie begins to suspect Echo of being the shredder.

18.title: Evil Genius
18.plot: Billie asks Echo to stand down in the presidential campaign, with no luck.

19.title: Sing When You're Winning
19.plot: Blake and Echo go head to head in their campaigns and Echo wins over the crowd with a song. Billie decides that Blake winning would be better than Echo, so she joins his campaign.

20.title: Vote Blake
20.plot: Billie joins Blake's campaign, much to everyone's dismay. Someone runs a smear campaign against Echo, which Billie gets the blame for.

21.title: The Dark Night
21.plot: Billie and Jane ask Mimi for advice on how to help Billie's situation. Billie begins to suspect Selene.

22.title: Imperfect Harmony
22.plot: Billie rules out Selene as a suspect.

23.title: One Minute
23.plot: Billie and Bubs are talking again. Django asks Selene to go to prom with him. Alessandro kidnaps Selene's guitar.

24.title: A Question for Billie
24.plot: Amani meets Alessandro, whose real name is actually Shak. Blake asks Billie to go to prom with him.

25.title: An Awesome Surprise
25.plot: Alessandro continues to taunt the gang with pictures of Selene's missing guitar.

26.title: Bounce Free Zone
26.plot: The gang agrees to help Selene find her guitar. Blake reveals he has a lead on who might have kidnapped Selene's guitar.

27.title: A Shake with Blake
27.plot: Billie meets Blake for a milkshake where he tells her the lead is Scarlette.

28.title: Where the Wild Things Are
28.plot: The gang follow Scarlette, which leads them straight to Selene's guitar. Billie agrees to go to prom with Blake.

29.title: Ordinary Heroes Assemble
29.plot: The gang try to prove that it was Scarlette who ruined Selene's guitar.

30.title: The Greenhouse Redemption
30.plot: Bubs agrees to be sent to The Greenhouse with a secret camera in order to get a confession out of Scarlette, but she is granted her freedom just as he arrives.

31.title: The Scarlet Letter
31.plot: Scarlette is accused of ruining Selene's guitar and accepts her punishment, but Echo proves that it couldn't have been her.

32.title: Shak Is Back
32.plot: Django proves that someone is trying to frame Scarlette. Amani and Shak agree to go to prom together, just as the gang become suspicious of Shak.

33.title: Social Media 101
33.plot: Jane overhears a rumour that someone will be on the receiving end of a prom prank.

34.title: The Taste of Freedom
34.plot: Bubs is released from The Greenhouse where he has become friends with Scarlette. Amani asks Shak about the prom prank.

35.title: Go Vox Pop!
35.plot: Selene agrees to help Amani with her Shak problem in the hopes that she'll finally get some peace and quiet to practice her song with Echo.

36.title: Viral Video
36.plot: Scarlette tells Bubs she has proof Blake is behind everything, but Blake tells Billie he has proof that Bubs is actually the villain.

37.title: Prom Night
37.plot: Bubs receives a threatening message from Alessandro and decides to rush to prom to warn Billie of a prom prank.

38.title: Crisis in Parallel Proms
38.plot: Billie is on the receiving end of a horrible prom prank. Bubs and Billie are determined to get revenge.

39.title: Election Night
39.plot: It's prom night, which means that the election winner will be announced in front of the entire school.

40.title: The Final Boss
40.plot: Billie gets a surprising confession out of Abi.

1.plot: Shari finds out that someone has hacked her Dixi account and that they have posted a horrible picture of her.

2.title: Prime Suspect
2.plot: Shari launches her new Dixi page: The Dixi Murder and comes up with her first suspect.

3.title: Nemesis
3.plot: Murdo helps Shari come up with a plan to catch Chloe.

imdb.plot outline: Shari and her friends all subscribe to 'Dixi' - a Facebook like social network for tweens. This is the place where they post updates on what they're doing, share their thoughts, play games, take part in online polls, upload photos and videos, etc. Shari learns that her profile has been hacked - photos defaced, embarrassing, crude insulting updates added. Not only that, but Shari has been locked out of her own account. But Shari won't give up and simply start a new profile - she's going to get her page back AND find whoever did this. But when her friends' pages start getting hacked they realise that there's a cyber 'serial killer' on the loose.
imdb.title: Dixi
plot: _Dixi_ (qv) is an online mystery drama. Join Billie and the League of Ordinary Heroes as they use _Dixi_ (qv) (an online social networking site) to hunt down who is causing havoc at their school.::Anonymous

Shari and her friends all subscribe to '_Dixi_ (qv)' - a Facebook like social network for tweens. This is the place where they post updates on what they're doing, share their thoughts, play games, take part in online polls, upload photos and videos, etc. Shari learns that her profile has been hacked - photos defaced, embarrassing, crude insulting updates added. Not only that, but Shari has been locked out of her own account. But Shari won't give up and simply start a new profile - she's going to get her page back AND find whoever did this. But when her friends' pages start getting hacked they realise that there's a cyber 'serial killer' on the loose.::Anonymous

The second series sees the friends have a major falling-out when a "cursed" chain message is posted on fictitious social networking site _Dixi_ (qv). Mimi sets out to prove that the curse isn't real - but someone is determined to drive the friends apart. In this new mystery, everyone is a suspect.

_Dixi_ (qv):3 will bring a new mystery and a new online menace as Shari, Mimi and the rest of the gang head off to another school for a 3 week Creative Arts course. Thrown together with a rival set of students to put on a showcase, the kids are meant to be learning about collaboration.... but someone lurking on social networking site _Dixi_ (qv) has different idea! Soon an anonymous troll is hitting the kids where it hurts - posting hateful comments online, attacking their avatars in their online game and even sabotaging their showcase rehearsals. 'The Nameless One' seems determined to stop the show... with time running out before the showcase, will Shari be able expose them and save the play before the curtain goes up?
synopsis: In the second series the friends have a major falling-out when a cursed chain message is posted on Dixi. Mimi sets out to prove that the curse isnt real, but someone is determined to drive the friends apart
